    IncTableauTranslators

    public static class IncTableauTranslators.LTL2LOSNGBW
extends AbstractTranslator<LTL,FSA>
    This is an IncrementalTableau translator from LTL formulae to label-on-state NGBW.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
